relation: Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Security is the most so this college also provide enough security facilities.
They celebrate different other countries festivals which make it lot of fun for other as well as for student from same culture.
Gathering with friends visiting local areas and most of going for project research is the best option.
It provide the best food and dining facilities too all the students according to there wish and there is no restriction for any students so students can have enough facilities regarding this.
Life in dorm is very good there cause its is not too expensive and all the students are from different country so it is fun knowing them and being close with them in dorm.

Various types of courses are available and mostly you can choose any course of interest you want so it is accepting most range of students for different courses. I too have chosen this college because of wide range of courses and there is the course which fits me best and its math and i'm happy with its academical studies too.

You can join University of Louisiana-Monroe without any doubt cause the quality education here wont make you feel down in any case. The students here are very helpful and social that you can be part of any group or community. The combination of myriad culture, religion, cast make it easy for any student from any society to join this college.

It is accredited and recognized as one of the top university of USA. The environment in ULM is very friendly and students can have all the advantages from teachers due to this. The most important thing is it provide the housing and dorm facilities in very safe place and very peaceful area.
pageTitle: University of Louisiana at Monroe Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {231993=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 50037=There are always activities to participate in. ULM is home to a nationally rank ski team and it is fun to watch the team skiing on the bayou. During Spring Fever, you can play Ooz Ball (volleyball in the mud), attend music concerts and other activities. The 2012 Spring Fever concert featured The Fray.}

textAfterTable: Great for these types of students I would advise anyone who enjoys learning,getting help, and be able to find the right field for them. I love this college because you can get help and the people/teachers are very friendly. This is the place to be. Tips for prospective students I transferred here from Arkansas and I have to admit it is very different. It is actually a home away from home You can get comfortable and have small things to keep you occupied meaning getting your mind off home sickness. Login to rate or flag the reviews LaBrittany from Junction City, AR 11/01/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 5 out of 5 people found this review useful. 3 of 57 Categories Comments Great for these types of students ULM is GREAT for all types of students!
